website_summaries.verdict: The Master & Dynamic MW07 Go true wireless earphones offer a solid listening experience, but are a bit light on extra features for their relatively high price.
pros: Strong audio performance with rich bass depth
cons: A little expensive for what you get
No AAC support—just AptX/SBC Bluetooth codecs

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.. Would Recommend to Others
customer_reviews.text: These are great... Love gaming with them on my IPad 11 Pro.. Very low latency and they allow me to pick up sounds around me. Mic also performs pretty well while gaming but not as well on phone calls... Not sure why that is. For music they perform really well and provide separate highs, mids and lows and a punchy bass, the bass isn't overly pronounced but is very present. For $200 bucks I like them better than my Bowers and Wilkins PX...
customer_reviews.author: Warndry

customer_reviews.title: Best sounds!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the best all around earbuds. Awesome bass, great mids and Good highs. There was always some compromise with other brands. However, these could use a tiny more trebles to make things pop, but overall they’re awesome, music sounds rich and full. They stay on the ear pretty good without falling out but has inconsistent seals. Bass would drop as you lean forward and back. Comfort is decent. After a few hours, those fins do bite into your ear. Battery life is great. How Durable are they? Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t stay in
customer_reviews.text: they wouldn’t stay in my ears. tried all fit combinations. the sound is great. the battery life is long.
customer_reviews.author: J Bender

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Connection Cuts Out A LOT
customer_reviews.text: These have pretty good sound, but the bluetooth connection cuts out a lot. It only cuts out for a second or 2, but that is totally unacceptable for bluetooth headphones. I'm returning these as a result.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Class leader earbuds for almost all people
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are incredibly comfortable and sound fantastic. Best sounding earbuds I have tried... And I tried every model from all major manufacturers! Even the plus version of this same line. If you care about sound quality, these are it. For most working out, these will stay put no problem. But for my current exercise type of choice, functional fitness with lots of changing dynamic movements, they loosened a few times. I just don't want to have to think about that in my routine. However, for lifting, treadmill, bike, jogging, etc. these should be great. Hands down the best.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Family

customer_reviews.title: Low volume, bad mic
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, was looking for true wireless earphones for working out but these didn't work for me. The volume is limited; I like to turn up the music when trying to hype myself up for a hard set, but these were just not getting loud enough. The mic quality is awful; the mic sounds muffled, so can't really use for video/audio calls.
customer_reviews.author: carlol

customer_reviews.title: Weak bass and harsh highs, mids
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these thinking they would be better than my Powerbeats 3. These headphones have really bad bass and harsh highs and mids. Returned them right away, guess I’m keeping my Powerbeats 3.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Airpod Pros. Buy these
customer_reviews.text: As a longtime airpods and then airpods pro user I decided to turn to these earbuds in the hopes of finding better sound quality that I can still wear while working out. Wow, these exceeded my expectations. Sound quality is incredible. Remarkable amount of bass for the size. They don't have active noise canceling like the airpod pros do but fit so well in your ear that I don't notice the difference. The little wings on the side also keep them much more firmly in place than the airpod pros. They aren't cheap, but if you want earbuds you can workout in and quality of expensive over the ear headphones, these are the clear choice.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly surprised with these earbuds. Physically, they are smaller and more lightweight than I expected. The buds firmly stay in my ears when I'm doing my physical activities (running and skateboarding). Still no issues with them popping out. I also barely feel them because of how light they are. The case is small which is another plus. In terms of sound, I'm very pleased. I've owned multiple true wireless earbuds (Jabra, Samsung, Sony) and these sound the best imo. Highs and lows are not overly pronounced in the sound signature, which I prefer because all genres sound consistent and balanced. Overall, the build quality is premium, they sound great, and these are now my new daily earbuds. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but not for multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is some of the best out of any TWS buds I have tried. Comfort wise, I do find these start to get uncomfortable after a few hours of having them in. Pairing between multiple devices is more or less a nightmare, and it is one of my biggest gripes about these buds. When switching between devices, i.e. a laptop and a phone, I have to turn off bluetooth on the first device, put them in the case, take them out, activate pairing, and repeat this process until it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: They just don't fit in the ears, and don't stay put
customer_reviews.text: For a product that is promoted as suitable for workouts, they are extremely disappointing. I thought I could make them work by using Comply Foam tips, but even those wouldn't keep them snugly in the ear canal. Now I've missed my return window, and I'm stuck with something that I might as well just throw away. They are poorly engineered to get deep enough in the ear canal to stay in place. I tried every combination of the tips and wings to no avail. If people are actually using these when working out, they must not be moving much, or they're content to push them in every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Flahute

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and support. Should have known better
customer_reviews.text: It stopped pairing completely. A few days over 1 month old and missed the return period. I have the pluses too and they’ve had intermittent issues. Sound is great but not if they don’t work. Run don’t walk away from all M&D products. Their support is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, good battery life, questionable ergonomics.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. But comfort is compromised in order to make sure they will not fall from your ears which means it's very hard to keep wearing them after 3-4 hours. You will be able to find wired IEMs for half the money that you can wear for longer even if not customized to your ear shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound & great for working out
customer_reviews.text: So, these earphones are amazing. The sound is great and the fit is comfortable. I like the size and case, and prefer these for travel - no wires, no bulk. Also! It’s nice to have high quality sound that I can wear when I’m jogging or trying to drown out the noise at the gym. Sleek and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dhere

customer_reviews.title: The ear buds you’ve been waiting for!
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are amazing! They are easy to use and so comfortable. Their biggest appeal though is the quality of the sound. You will hear your music and podcasts like you’ve never heard them before. All the subtle and compelling sounds come alive and there is incredible clarity. And oh yeah, the buds and their case are gorgeous as well. So elegant and tastefully destined. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: IRIS ADLER

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Much better cheaper options
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a total of 1 day. Just stopped working. And yes they were charged. Not enough bass in either one. For the price one should expect better
customer_reviews.author: Ray Benner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 90 days
customer_reviews.text: I liked these at first. They sound good and fit snugly. They received light use. An hour per day in the house during my workout, 6 days a week. They received no abuse at all, they were cared for, never dropped. Unfortunately, they don't last. They started to fail around 60 days in. They would make a little noise then disconnect. Now I am just short of 90 days and they won't connect at all to anything. It is a shame that quality on these seems to be dropping so much.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort but not good in crowded spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for workouts and travel. While I was disappointed at its mic especially when speaking in crowded spaces like airport and city streets, the real reason I returned it was the glitching in the reception of music in certain situations. Some of the situations I was able to isolate were crowded spaces but I also experienced random glitching outdoors. For a product as expensive, I expect better. I will miss its sound and comfort during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Chanakya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound meets decent fit
customer_reviews.text: Ear fit and security need tweaked to be of better use for running.
customer_reviews.author: Taurean26.2

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit, but quality control from M&D seems horrendous.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I have to return them again. The first pair stopped pairing with my phone after 4 days, this pair’s charging case has stopped receiving a charge itself. Switched charging cables, switched charging bricks, case still will not re-charge. Gonna try one more replacement......
customer_reviews.author: Yicheng F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not very loud...
customer_reviews.text: Sound was clear but overall volume was not very loud, returned and went with Beats Plus. They aren’t as clean in sound but have more volume that I like when running.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sounds, quick connection, volume control. These are a definite home run.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Dealer

customer_reviews.title: The best earbuds, highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds I've ever had for working out, great sound quality and fit very comfortably!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great earbuds. Battery is awesome And sound quality is impressive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underrated reliability
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned both Chifi and known brands including Apple Bose and Jabra and these after 9 months remain my go to ear buds for running and working outdoors. I have never owned m&d because of their wonky designs but they have nailed every aspect of sound build and sonic quality. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: TWH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buds priced right
customer_reviews.text: Terrific sound, comfort. Hands down the best in music reproduction. Try them to believe the magic these little buds capable of. Give them couple of days to break-in if at all you think they sound flat.
customer_reviews.author: chitsu

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Save your money... I've already gone through 2 sets, For some reason the left earbud stopped working properly after 2months on both sets.
customer_reviews.author: cisco559

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of Earbuds, these are the best sound I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: big baller

customer_reviews.title: I decided to splurge
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splurge on these instead of getting my normal cheap throwaway jbirds. I'm really happy I did because I can honestly say I've never heard highs or lows until I got these. Love-em. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Weng

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great company
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying my headphones a lot so far, and I just wanted to say that the company was very responsive and generous to a shipping issue I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Audiophile headphones for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Audiophile headphones for on the go. They sound amazing and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James Earls

customer_reviews.title: Good except one thing
customer_reviews.text: Only down side is can’t listen to the left solo, has to be with right, but can listen to the right solo
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Trejo

customer_reviews.title: The Best all around True
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible, had them for a week now. Battery life is great, sound incredible, small, light weight. I am using Comply foam tips to help seal, but man after all the time and money spent on so many other brands I can say no disappointments at all with these. I did try the new Plus model first - nice, but the size and $ saving led me to these. Also like this case better.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wallner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound but stopped connecting after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I have all kinds of earbuds, it's become an obsession. I would give these top marks except for the fact that they are now paperweights as they no longer connect or pair to any of my devices. I clean them regularly and take care of my stuff but this is unacceptable at this price point since I have $40 pair with rivaled sound quality. Master & Dynamic prides themselves on build quality but they failed here.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome until they cut out repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: The sound and fit are incredible. I would give them 5 stars overall. They’re perfect as long as nobody else around you is trying to use Bluetooth earbuds. But at the gym they’re worthless. The connection cuts out multiple times per second and renders the earbuds unusable. My over the ear Bluetooth Sony headphones have absolutely no problem with cutting out anywhere. M&D needs to fix the connection problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality. Buggy connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Much deeper and richer than my AirPod Pros. The fit is great and they really block out outside sound incredibly well. I have two issue with these earbuds that will likely cause me to go back to my AirPods: 1. As others have mentioned, they frequently lose connection—with my iPhone and with each other. It’s not a proximity issue. I’m talking about situations when the phone is in my hand or in my shirt pocket in daily use over two months. 2. The microphone is terrible. Virtually useless for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Not working on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Right earbud not charging or working. Have returned. Waiting until credit is received before ordering a new pair. These come highly recommended for audiophiles and I was looking forward to putting them through their paces. Disappointed now but will amend review upon getting a working pair.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great sound
customer_reviews.text: I usually find wireless headphones to be uncomfortable or fall out of my ear but these fit really well. As with all products from this brand the sound quality is great. Charging case is really nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of wireless in ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair of similarly priced Libratone Track Air + headphones that I'd finally lost patience with. The sound was always dropping out, the earbuds always slipping out, the sound was underwhelming. Bought the M&Ds without having done a huge amount of research but the risk paid off handsomely. The 'wings' mean they actually stay in place and they have a deal more bass heft than the Libratones without ever being overpowering. Trebles and mid very natural (using 'Flat' EQ setting on an iPhone). Well made, good seal in the ear and very comfortable. Nice little charging box. Kind of miss the 'tap to pause' of other headphones but not nearly enough to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: HUW C WATKINS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Had tried many brands of earbuds for running including Jaybirds and RHA. All had problems; either they didn’t last, fell out a lot while trail running, had poor battery life or inadequate volume to overcome wind noise while cycling. These, on the other hand are great. Snug fit with wings, great sound, no dropouts and v long battery life. Perfect running companion. Can’t fault em.
customer_reviews.author: SM Roe

product_meta.title: MW07 Go True Wireless Earphones - Flame Red, One size
feature_bullets: Included components: Earphones, Charging Case, Fabric Pouch, Ear Tips, Fit Wings, Charger

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
